qas.question: What is the largest inland port for China?
How long is the Port of Nanjing?
How many berths does the Port contain?
When did Longtan Containers Port Area open up?
How many containers can Longtan Containers Port Area handle?

context: <a0_0>Port of Nanjing<a0_0/> is the largest inland port in China, with annual cargo tonnage reached 191,970,000 t in 2012. The port area is <a1_0>98 kilometres (61 mi) in length<a1_0/> and has <a2_0>64<a2_0/> berths including 16 berths for ships with a tonnage of more than 10,000. Nanjing is also the biggest container port along the Yangtze River; in <a3_0>March 2004<a3_0/>, the <a4_0>one million container-capacity<a4_0/> base, Longtan Containers Port Area opened, further consolidating Nanjing as the leading port in the region. As of 2010, it operated six public ports and three industrial ports.
